s: 4 days ago - As a part of the acquisition, Kmart ... Sears, Roebuck, and Co., was transformed into the new Sears Holdings Corporation. s: Sears, Roebuck & Co. was founded in 1886 in Chicago, Illinois. It published a general merchandise mail order catalog and consumer guide from 1888 until 1993. It is the author of the 1897 Sears Roebuck & Co. Catalogue and the 1908 Sears, Roebuck & Co. Catalogue.
